lead_paragraph: A new report in The New England Journal of Medicine confirms what many cancer researchers have known — that an “epidemic” can be traced to overdiagnosis.

headline.print_headline: Tumors That Should Be Left Alone
headline.main: Got a Thyroid Tumor? Most Should Be Left Alone.

snippet: A new report in The New England Journal of Medicine confirms what many cancer researchers have known — that an “epidemic” can be traced to overdiagnosis....
abstract: Study in The New England Journal of Medicine reports high percentage of women in United States, France, Italy, Australia and South Korea who had thyroids removed due to diagnosis of thyroid cancer should have left tumors alone; increased use of imaging technology contributed to over-diagnosis that led to unnecessary treatment.
